Heartbleed
Team 50s 3307 Group Project. A platformer game where you, the user, is spawned in as a computer bug with the goal of infiltrating and infecting the computer system. Navigate through the terrain, avoid/defeat enemies, enjoy a beautiful soundtrack and attempt to conquer the final boss.

Detailed Description

Utility class for handling collisions between SFML shapes and sprites.

Member Function Documentation

◆ checkCollision()

bool Collider::checkCollision ( Collider & other,
sf::Vector2f & direction,
float push )

Checks for collision between this and another collider.

Checks for and resolves collision with another collider.

Parameters
otherThe other collider.
directionReference to store the direction of the collision.
pushHow much to push the collider on collision.
Returns
True if a collision occurred.
Parameters
otherThe other collider to test against.
directionOutput parameter giving the direction of collision.
pushDetermines how much to push each collider (0 to 1).
Returns
True if collision occurred, false otherwise.

Moves the collider by a specified amount.

Moves the collider object by a delta in both axes.
